summary: After capturing a drug lord, Felix Leiter is left for dead and his wife is murdered. James Bond goes rogue and seeks vengeance on those responsible, as he infiltrates an organisation posing as a hitman.
cast: Timothy Dalton|Carey Lowell|Robert Davi|Talisa Soto|Anthony Zerbe|Frank McRae|Everett McGill|Wayne Newton|Benicio Del Toro|Anthony Starke|Pedro Armendáriz Jr.|Desmond Llewelyn|David Hedison|Priscilla Barnes|Robert Brown|Caroline Bliss|Don Stroud|Grand L. title: 007: Licencia para matar
